title: Alabama executes inmate, 83, oldest in modern U.S. history
text:
Alabama executes inmate, 83, oldest in modern U.S. history 12:59pm BST - 00:43 
Alabama Department of Corrections Commissioner Jeff Dunn announced the execution of 83-year-old convicted pipe-bomb killer, Walter Moody, the oldest known person put to death in the modern era of U.S. capital punishment. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
